1.content: Your wife shannon has a gift, she can turn you into whatever she wants, whenever she wants. Sometimes she does this for personal convenience, she once used you as a shoe for a week because she could only find one of the pair. But mostly, her power is used for mutual pleasure, she turns you into somethi g and then pretends not to know its you. You both get enormous enjoyment from that. And today is finaly transform day. Shannon always decides what you will be, you sometimes request things but she normaly doesnt do them. Today shannon has decided you will be...
1.title: Its that time again

choices: The front door, you take the place of one of her shoes
In a drawer, you are a sock
Under the bed, you dont know what
In a cupboard, you are a bra
11.content: You knew it was time when you got a text saying "lie on the bed x" from your wife, she was out at the moment and would be for another few hours. This diddnt mean you couldnt get started however. When she transforms you, you get transported to the location where that object would normaly go, today that would be...
11.title: An item of clothing

choices: She grabs shannons shoes to lend to her friend
111.content:
A flash, and suddenly you are on the floor looking up at a door, the front door to your house. You sat waiting for shannon to come home for an hour, occasional noise comming from your daughters room upstairs. You always felt uneasy when your daughter lauren was home when your wife changed you. So much chance for a mistake, considering lauren doesnt know about you and your wifes activities she isnt very careful about using objects in the house. She has often accidentaly taken or used you without knowing it. Especialy when your wife changes you into something in an open area, like the time you became a boiled sweet in the bowl on the table. Shannon slowley took a few sweets out the bowl all week, leaving you in there, one day she left the house for a few hours, while she was gone lauren came down and innocently plucked a sweet from the bowl, she popped it in her mouth and left the house to meet friends. You were quickly thrown into her huge mouth, she sucked on you for half an hour, swallowing every few sucks, you felt part of yourself get ripped from your sweet body and get pulled down her throat each time, it was agony. Your wife normaly numbed you before she used you, but this was 100% awake and felt. Eventualy your wife figured out what happened but by that point your daughter was at a friends house digesting you, your wife had to wait for lauren to come home and fall asleep to get you out.
Obviously shannon never learnt her lesson from that, so the grape incident and the toilet paper incident also happened, to name just 2 more of dozens(maybe 60 incidents in the last 8 months, not as many as usual over the last 6 years and over 27,000 similar happenings) justas you finished thinking lauren xcame down stairs and was heading for the shoe rack...
111.title: The front door, you take the place of one of he...

choices: your daughter, who was out of clean bras and raided her mom's room!
114.content:
You suddenly appear folded in a dark dresser drawer, cracked slightly to allow light in for your benefit on the occasions when you do this. You are surrounded by your wife's other bras. Today you're specifically a sports bra; your wife has very large boobs, which means that sometimes it can be hard for her to find sports bras that fit; your daughter has the same problem, although for obvious reasons she isn't willing to talk with you about it, you have overheard her discussing it with your wife whilst you were transformed.

After a few hours, someone comes into the room and puts you on. It's…
114.title: Bra

choices: The fruit bowl, you are a grape
The fruit bowl, you are a banana
The fridge, you are leftovers from last night
The freezer, you are ice cream

This diddnt mean you couldnt get started however. When she transforms you, you get transported to the location where that object would normaly go, today that would be...
12.title: A piece of food

choices: Your daughter grabs your banana form
122.content:
A flash and your surroundings changed to the kitchen, more specifically the fruit bowl. You were one of a pile of 5 bananas in a bowl, you were the top banana so had a good view of the room which today incluided something extra, a girl.
Your daughter was leaning on the counter right infront of you, luckily she wasnt looking when you changed, she was staring at her phone with her back to the bowl, her left hand just touching the side. Your wife wouldnt be home for atleast 2 hours so you had to hope that your daughter diddnt become hungry for her favourite food before then.
122.title: The fruit bowl, you are a banana

choices: Your wife doesnt know anything is wrong
1221.content:
Without warning your daughter blindly reaches back and her hand brushes against your peel. She recoils slightly then roughly grabs you, squeezing you slightly. Still not looking at you once, not caring as you are to her, just a banana, she stcks you in her back pocket as she leaves the kitchen heading up stairs. She must be heading for her room to consume you. She puts her phone away and enters the bathroom. Taking you out she peels you, it feels strange but not uncomfortable, and places you on the floor infront of the mirror, she then takes her phone out and places it under the sink, shes filming you. She then leaves the bathroom, her bare foot slapping against the tile as she went. When sh returned a moment later she had her converse on, the pair she had owned for the last 4 years, they used to be white once but not now. Then she started, first, she stepped either side of you and turned on the tap, but then she stepped a little bit to the left reaching for her makeup bag, when she did she stepped right onto part of your banana body. You felt extreme pain and your body squish into the treads of her converse, when she stepped back to the sink she diddnt move her foot that was on you, she simply stepped onto you with her other foot., the same feeling shot through you.

This continued for 6 more minutes, then she stepped away from where your banana form once was, now only a slurry of yellow remained, most of your body was stck in her shoes treads, mostly in her left converse where your eyes were. Your daughter had just trampled you to paste and wasnt even aware of it. To her all she did was stand on a banana for a few minutes,. To add to that, she started to mop your remains off the floor with some toilet paper, she threw it in the toilet then spat on it. She thought about flushing now or after she went to the toilet.she decided to not waste the water and began pulling her tight jeans down her legs, she sat a did what she needed to, then stood and flushed. You felt everything, then suddenly your connection to the part of you that was soaking in her spit and urine faded. She then took off her right shoe and, not wanting to waste a good banana, started licking off the bits that were crushed into her treads. You felt her tounge rip your body off the shoe and into her mouth where she gathered enough of you to swallow. Her shoes had already done the "chewing" so down her throat you went. Only your body under her keft shoe remained, where your consciousnes was. She started walking, she went downstairs. opened the front door and left the house. You were in for a rogh ride stuck in your daughters old converse. For atleast another few hours till your wife got home and figured out what happened...

(inspiration for this chapter https://youtu.be/3ISR5B3nV94 )
1221.title: Your daughter grabs your banana form

141.content: You imediately knew where you were, the smell of tobacco was over powering. You had become a cigarrette in a 20 pack. You had done thiss once before without incident. Your wife transformed you into a cigarrette in a pack that was still in the shop, behind the flap with all the other normal packs. Your wife knew roughly how far back you were so waited to buy you when she thought you were in the next pack. Luckily she was right, today was the same, you felt your row of packs slide forwards, then the impact of the flap rippled through the packs. You sat there for 4 hours, slowly moving closer to the front of the row. Eventualy your pack was grabbed roughly from the shelf and was scanned, the beep was loud, you were dropped onto the counter and after a few seconds your pack was lifted and shoved into a pocket. You dont know if your wife was the one who bought you...
141.title: A pack of cigarrettes, you are one

choices: You are still in her pack, for now
1412.content:
*taras perspective*
Tara walked into the shop, she only needed cigarrettes but the line already had 3 people waiting. She walked up to the person at the back, her name workplace name badge said shannon (your wife) "hey, can i jump infront, i just need one thing" said tara, hoping. "Emm, yeah sure go ahead" shannon said, not realy thinking too hard about it. Tara got to the front, she requested her brand of cig, the worker turned and grabbed the pack, proceding to scan and drop it on the counter. Tara paid and grabbed her cigarrettes, shoving them ibto her tight jeans pocket. Once outside she grabbed for the pack, opening it she took out a cigarrette, she placed it between her lips, gripping it with them, lightly tounging the end. She reached for her lighter, pulling it out she lit it, the yellow flame wiggling in the breeze. She brought it up to the tip of the cig, it cought and began to burn. She took blew a billow of smoke out her mouth and nose, she continued smoking for a few minutes. When the cigarrette was almost all tge way down to her lips she took it out of her mouth, looking around there was nowhere to dispose of it properly, so she simply dropped it to the ground and lifted her left, dirty white converse. She diddnt even stomp or grind the cigarrette out, she simply stepped onto it then continued walking without looking back...
1412.title: Nope, not this time

info.brief_description: Your wife can change you into objects
info.description:
Your wife has the ability to turn you into any inanimate thing she wants, food, clothes, objects. You and her do this often for sexual pleasure. However things dont always go to plan, especialy when your 19 year old daughter lauren gets involved without knowing it.

Please add whenever you want, just make sure chapters are good, and long.
I will delete if it doesnt fit.
Only rules:
has to be inanimate tf
Your daughter NEVER knows you are an abject
